mapper.select: SELECT n.*, m.name, m.member_position FROM notification n LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON n.noti_sender = m.member_no WHERE n.noti_receiver = #{param1} AND (noti_state = '0' OR noti_state = '1') ORDER BY n.noti_no DESC
SELECT count(*) AS noti_count FROM notification WHERE cast(noti_state as UNSIGNED) = '0' AND noti_receiver = #{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE notification SET noti_state = '1' WHERE noti_no = #{param1}
UPDATE notification SET noti_state='2' WHERE noti_no=#{param1}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM notification WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), noti_date) > 7
